meanings.sent1: The scientist studied fluorines in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use fluorines in various experiments.
meanings.sent3: The fluorines in the beaker started dancing a little jig.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas collided like fluorines in a test tube.
meanings.sent5: The bright green color of fluorines made them easy to spot.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the chemical element fluorine.
meanings.sent1: I learned about fluorines in my science class.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes fluorines as well.
meanings.sent3: The fluorines on the chart seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: Their voices mixed like fluorines in a chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The teacher pointed to the fluorines on the board for us to see.
